Question:
Context
Corrected Shakers’ belief; taught that marriage is ordained of God (1831).
Quote
“Marriage is ordained of God.”
Application
Honor, prepare for, and strengthen family relationships.

Context
From Liberty Jail (1839); priesthood power works only with righteousness.
Quote
“The rights of the priesthood … cannot be controlled nor handled only on the principles of righteousness.”
Application
Lead with love, persuasion, and kindness in all relationships.

Context
Revelation on priesthood and ordinances (1832).
Quote
“In the ordinances thereof, the power of godliness is manifest.”
Application
Ordinances bring God’s power into your life—value and attend them.

Context
“Olive Leaf” revelation (1832); instruction for the School of the Prophets.
Quote
“Seek learning, even by study and also by faith.”
Application
Seek knowledge both spiritually and temporally with faith.
Why is it important to build self-reliance while you are young, and how can this prepare you to serve the Lord and others in the future?
